Token.Abstract: Sets the applicationId and clientKey of your application.

Parameter.Name: applicationId
Parameter.Abstract: The application id for your Parse application.

Parameter.Name: clientKey
Parameter.Abstract: The client key for your Parse application.

Token.Abstract: Set whether to show offline messages when using a Parse view or view controller related classes.

Parameter.Name: enabled
Parameter.Abstract: Whether a UIAlert should be shown when the device is offline and network access is required from a view or view controller.

Token.Abstract: Set whether to show an error message when using a Parse view or view controller related classes and a Parse error was generated via a query.

Parameter.Name: enabled
Parameter.Abstract: Whether a UIAlert should be shown when a Parse error occurs.
